ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: Why did I start a bard?  Well when retail first came out I started up a monk on Tarew Marr and played him up about 15 levels. He was really cool and all, but
ygData.messageBody:
Why did I start a bard? Well when retail first came out I started
up a monk on Tarew Marr and played him up about 15 levels. He was really
cool and all, but nothing special.

> I found out my guild from another game had started up on Bertox so I moved
> there, and rolled up the one character class I had never really had much
> contact with on Tarew Marr - the bard. I gotta admit the one single thing
> about bards at the time that intrigued me was their speed and health
> regen.
>
> Back at the beginning of retail there were alot of unknowns..we didnt
> really have a clue what songs we got above lvl 20. I had to discover how
> to use lullaby (and oh my did that song rock the world back then), chains
> was a godsend when I got it...charm was amazing...all these things I
> discovered on my own and with the help of this list...but why did I start
> a bard?
>
> SPEED! .... do I have it now? Nope...I plod along like a crippled
> red-headed stepchild and will never take bard speed for granted again.
>
> Lago Bardoon of Bertox
> Lvl 54 Minstrel
> Guild Leader, Defenders of Aleria
